mainboard.name: And They Shall Know No Fear

decks.notes: The key concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aggressive vampire creatures led by Edgar Markov. By utilizing low-cost creatures and powerful tribal synergies, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. The inclusion of various vampire lords and tribal support cards like Captivating Vampire, Legion Lieutenant, and Shared Animosity enhances the deck's ability to pump up its creatures and maximize damage output. Additionally, the deck includes removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push to deal with opposing threats, ensuring the vampires can continue their relentless assault. By focusing on speed, efficiency, and tribal synergies, this aggro deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through countering spells, card draw, and removal while slowly building up resources to overwhelm the opponent. Eris, Roar of the Storm serves as the commander, providing a powerful control option alongside a variety of spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck utilizes a mix of counterspells like Counterspell and Force of Will, card draw spells like Brainstorm and Fact or Fiction, and removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Pyroclasm to maintain control of the board. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's strategy, this deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent to secure victory.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize Yuriko, The Tiger's Shadow as the commander to trigger her ability by consistently casting high CMC cards from the top of the library. The deck is packed with low CMC spells and creatures to ensure Yuriko's ability is triggered frequently, allowing for damage to be dealt to the opponent and card advantage to be gained. The deck focuses on controlling the board with counterspells and removal spells while also having evasive creatures like Faerie Ninjas to pressure the opponent. The goal is to quickly deplete the opponent's life total by consistently attacking with evasive creatures and utilizing Yuriko's ability to win the game.

mainboard.name: And They Shall Know No Fear
